languages.text: {n}Гневная гримаса перекашивает лицо недочеловека.{/n} "Да, и за это богохульство я тоже тебя накажу. За смерть каждого чистого. За надругательство над телом пастыря. Когда-то он благословил меня быть Немезитом и расчищать тропу для детей Многорукого Императора, но ты свершил{mf||а} немыслимое. Пришла пора ответить, мертвые жаждут возмездия".

{n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."
languages.original_text: {n}Гневная гримаса перекашивает лицо недочеловека.{/n} "Да, и за это богохульство я тоже тебя накажу. За смерть каждого чистого. За надругательство над телом пастыря. Когда-то он благословил меня быть Немезитом и расчищать тропу для детей Многорукого Императора, но ты свершил{mf||а} немыслимое. Пришла пора ответить, мертвые жаждут возмездия".

traits.locale_text: {n}An angry grimace twists the subhuman's face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy. For purging every untainted soul. For desecrating the body of the Shepherd. He once blessed me to be a Nemesite and clear the path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor, but you have done the unthinkable. You will pay for these transgressions here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

{n}An angry grimace twists the subhuman's face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy. For purging every untainted soul. For desecrating the body of the Shepherd. He once blessed me to be a Nemesite and clear the path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor, but you have done the unthinkable. You will pay for these transgressions here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

{n}An angry grimace twists the subhuman's face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of the Shepherd. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. And yet, you have done the unthinkable. You will pay for these transgressions here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

{n}An angry grimace twists the subhuman's face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of the Shepherd. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. And yet, you have done the unthinkable. You will pay for these transgressions here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

{n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

{n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

languages.text: {n}Eine wütende Grimasse verzerrt sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ja, und ich werde Euch für diese Blasphemie bestrafen – für jede reine Seele, die Ihr getilgt habt, und dafür, dass Ihr den Leichnam unseres Anführers entweiht habt. Er hat mich einmal gesegnet und mich zum Nemesite gemacht, auf dass ich den Kindern des vielarmigen Imperators einen Weg bereite. Ihr habt das Unvorstellbare getan. Ihr werdet hier und jetzt bezahlen, weil die Toten nach Rache dürsten."
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine wütende Grimasse verzerrt sein Gesicht.{/n} "Ja, und ich werde Euch für diese Blasphemie bestrafen – für jede reine Seele, die Ihr getilgt habt, und dafür, dass Ihr den Leichnam unseres Anführers entweiht habt. Er hat mich einmal gesegnet und mich zum Nimesite gemacht, auf dass ich den Kindern des vielarmigen Imperators einen Weg bereite. Ihr habt das Unvorstellbare getan. Ihr werdet hier und jetzt bezahlen, weil die Toten nach Rache dürsten."

languages.text: {n}Una mueca de furia retuerce su expresión.{/n} «Sí, y te castigaré por esa blasfemia, por cada alma pura que has purgado y por profanar el cuerpo de nuestro guía. Me bendijo una vez, y me llamó a ser Nemesitio y abrir un camino para los hijos del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Has hecho lo impensable. Pagarás aquí y ahora, porque los muertos están sedientos de venganza».
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mueca de furia retuerce su expresión.{/n} «Sí, y te castigaré por esa blasfemia, por cada alma pura que has purgado y por profanar el cuerpo de nuestro guía. Me bendijo una vez, y me llamó a ser Nemesitio y abrir un camino para los hijos del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Has hecho lo impensable. Pagarás aquí y ahora, porque los muertos están sedientos de venganza».

languages.text: {n}怒りの表情がゆがむ。{/n}「そうだ、そして私はその冒涜のためにお前を罰する…お前が浄化したすべての純粋な魂のため、そして我々を導く体を冒涜した罪で。あの方はかつて私を祝福し、ネメサイトとなり、千手皇帝の子らのために道を開くよう求めた。お前は信じられない行いをしたのだ。今ここで償え。死者は復讐に飢えているの」
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒りの表情がゆがむ。{/n}「そうだ、そして私はその冒涜のためにお前を罰する…お前が浄化したすべての純粋な魂のため、そして我々を導く体を冒涜した罪で。あの方はかつて私を祝福し、ネメサイトとなり、千手皇帝の子らのために道を開くよう求めた。お前は信じられない行いをしたのだ。今ここで償え。死者は復讐に飢えているの」

languages.text: {n}涅墨斯特的脸在愤怒中扭曲。{/n}“没错，我要为你的亵渎行为惩罚你。你泯灭了那些纯洁的灵魂，亵渎了我们导师的躯体。祂曾赐予我祝福，让我以涅墨斯特的身份活下去，为四臂神皇的子嗣扫清道路。你做了无法原谅的事情，你要在此时此地付出代价，因为死者渴望复仇。”
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨斯特的脸在愤怒中扭曲。{/n}“没错，我要为你的亵渎行为惩罚你。你泯灭了那些纯洁的灵魂，亵渎了我们导师的躯体。祂曾赐予我祝福，让我以涅墨斯特的身份活下去，为四臂神皇的子嗣扫清道路。你做了无法原谅的事情，你要在此时此地付出代价，因为死者渴望复仇。”

languages.text: {n}Son visage se tord de colère.{/n} « Oui, et je vous châtierai pour ce blasphème... pour avoir profané le corps de notre guide et pour chaque âme pure condamnée par vous. Il m'a béni autrefois. Il a fait de moi un Némésite pour ouvrir la voie aux enfants de l'Empereur aux mille bras. Vous avez commis l'impensable. Et vous allez le payer, ici et maintenant, car les morts crient vengeance. »
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage se tord de colère.{/n} « Oui, et je vous châtierai pour ce blasphème... pour avoir profané le corps de notre guide et pour chaque âme pure condamnée par vous. Il m'a béni autrefois. Il a fait de moi un Némésite pour ouvrir la voie aux enfants de l'Empereur aux mille bras. Vous avez commis l'impensable. Et vous allez le payer, ici et maintenant, car les morts crient vengeance. »

languages.text: {n}Yüzü öfkeyle buruşuyor.{/n} "Evet ve dine karşı aykırılığın nedeniyle seni cezalandıracağım. Canını aldığın tüm o saf insanlar ve bedenini kirlettiğin kılavuzumuz için... O ki bir vakitler beni kutsayıp Nemezit olmaya ve Çok Kollu İmparator'un çocuklarına yol açmaya davet etmişti. Sense en umulmayanı yaptın. Bunun bedelini şimdi, burada ödeyeceksin çünkü ölüler intikam arzuluyor."
languages.original_text: {n}An angry grimace twists his face.{/n} "Yes, and I will punish you for that blasphemy — for every pure soul you purged, and for desecrating the body of our guide. He blessed me once, and called on me to be a Nemesite and clear a path for the children of the Many-Armed Emperor. You have done the unthinkable. You will pay here and now, because the dead are hungry for vengeance."
